content: c o t t o n p l a c e m a t s materials 10ply/aran cotton yarn 5 5mm hook stitch marker stitches i use us terms magic_ring single_crochet=single_crochet double_crochet=double_crochet pm=place marker notes this pattern is crocheted in the round in a spiral fashion there is no need to join each round use the stitch marker to keep track of the end of each round and move up as you go pattern begin with magic_ring chain 2 does not count as stitch round one into the magic_ring work 12 double_crochet pm in last stitch do not join 12dc round two 2dc in each stitch around move marker to last stitch of this round do not join 24dc round three *2dc in first stitch 1dc in next stitch repeat from * until back to marker do not join 36dc round four *2dc in first stitch 1dc in next two stitches repeat from * until back to marker do not join 48dc round five *2dc in first stitch 1dc in next three stitches repeat from * until back to marker do not join 60dc round six *2dc in first stitch 1dc in next four stitches repeat from * until back to marker do not join 72dc round seven *2dc in first stitch 1dc in next five stitches repeat from * until back to marker do not join 84dc round eight *2dc in first stitch 1dc in next six stitches repeat from * until back to marker do not join 96dc round nine *2dc in first stitch 1dc in next seven stitches repeat from * until back to marker do not join 108dc round ten *single_crochet in first two stitches skip the next two stitches then 6dc in the following stitch skip two stitches single_crochet in next two stitches repeat from * to end of round you should have twelve 6dc cluster fans round 11 this round begins in the middle of a section of four single_crochet stitches create an single_crochet around the post of the second and third single_crochet in this row to do this insert your hook into the second single_crochet and then from the back through the third single_crochet yarn over and pull through to create your single_crochet skip the fourth single_crochet then stitch 2dc into each of the six fan stitches skip one single_crochet then repeat from * around you will create 12 scalloped petals to finish this round slip_stitch into the first single_crochet of the round and tie off sew in your ends block with steam or by dampening then pinning the placemat out to set the stitches and improve the shape of your placemats c o t
